## MessageTypes variable

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Identifies a [IMessage](./daf-core.imessage.md) that represents a Selective Disclosure Request

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
MessageTypes: {
    sdr: string;
}
```

## Remarks

See [Selective Disclosure Request](https://github.com/uport-project/specs/blob/develop/messages/sharereq.md)
